reviewText: My father remembers this from his childhood and he got it for me in my childhood.  The music is infectious, the animation is whimsical (albeit a bit crude in comparison to today,) and I have the fondest memories of this show.  I have tried in vain (so far) to find this on DVD, but I do have the tape.  The show is fun, sweet, and perfect for all little children.  And grown-up children.
